20110103050019.000|20110103050023.000|CC1|>> NOW C-SPAN IS FEATURE        
20110103050023.000|20110103050025.000|CC1|DOCUMENTARY, "THE SUPREME COURT 
20110103050025.000|20110103050027.000|CC1|-- HOME TO AMERICA'S HIGHEST    
20110103050027.000|20110103050031.000|CC1|COURT."                         
20110103050031.000|20110103050034.000|CC1|>> THE HONORABLE, THE CHIEF     
20110103050034.000|20110103050036.000|CC1|JUSTICE AND THE ASSOCIATE       
20110103050036.000|20110103050038.000|CC1|JUSTICES OF THE SUPREME COURT OF
20110103050038.000|20110103050039.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES.              
20110103050039.000|20110103050040.000|CC1|>> SOMETHING IS DIFFERENT THAT  
20110103050040.000|20110103050043.000|CC1|GOES ON HERE THAT GOES ON IN THE
20110103050043.000|20110103050044.000|CC1|CAPITOL BUILDING AND THE WHITE  
20110103050044.000|20110103050044.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110103050044.000|20110103050046.000|CC1|>> YOU NEED TO APPRECIATE HOW   
20110103050046.000|20110103050047.000|CC1|IMPORTANT IT IS TO OUR SYSTEM OF
20110103050047.000|20110103050048.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT.                     
20110103050048.000|20110103050049.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE HIGHEST COURT IN 
20110103050049.000|20110103050050.000|CC1|THE LAND.                       
20110103050050.000|20110103050052.000|CC1|AND THE FRAMERS CREATED IT      
20110103050052.000|20110103050054.000|CC1|AFTER STUDYING THE GREAT        
20110103050054.000|20110103050056.000|CC1|LAWGIVERS IN HISTORY.           
20110103050056.000|20110103050058.000|CC1|>> THE GOVERNMENT CONCEDES THAT 
20110103050058.000|20110103050059.000|CC1|THE DESTRUCTION OF DOCUMENTS IN 
20110103050059.000|20110103050101.000|CC1|ANTICIPATION OF A PROCEEDING -- 
20110103050101.000|20110103050102.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF THESE CASES ARE VERY
20110103050102.000|20110103050103.000|CC1|CLOSE.                          
20110103050103.000|20110103050105.000|CC1|YOU GO IN ON A KNIFE'S EDGE.    
20110103050105.000|20110103050107.000|CC1|WE DO NOT DECIDE WHO OUGHT TO   
20110103050107.000|20110103050109.000|CC1|WIN.                            
20110103050109.000|20110103050110.000|CC1|WE DECIDE WHO WINS UNDER THE    
20110103050110.000|20110103050112.000|CC1|LAW THAT THE PEOPLE ADOPTED.    
20110103050112.000|20110103050114.000|CC1|>> YOU WOULD BE SURPRISED BY    
20110103050114.000|20110103050118.000|CC1|THE HIGH LEVEL OF COLLEGIALITY. 
20110103050118.000|20110103050120.000|CC1|>> IF ANY OF THE FOUR OF THE    
20110103050120.000|20110103050121.000|CC1|NINE OF US DECIDE TO HEAR THE   
20110103050121.000|20110103050126.000|CC1|CASE, WE WILL HEAR IT.          
20110103050126.000|20110103050129.000|CC1|WE ARE HERE TO DECIDE THINGS.   
20110103050129.000|20110103050130.000|CC1|THE JOB IS TO DECIDE.           
20110103050130.000|20110103050131.000|CC1|WE DECIDE.                      
20110103050131.000|20110103050132.000|CC1|>> WE CANNOT HAVE A DECISION OF 
20110103050132.000|20110103050133.000|CC1|DISCOURSE.                      
20110103050133.000|20110103050135.000|CC1|>> WE DECIDE IMPORTANT QUESTIONS
20110103050135.000|20110103050135.000|CC1|AND THAT MEANS YOU HAVE TO DO   
20110103050135.000|20110103050137.000|CC1|YOUR BEST TO GET IT RIGHT.      
20110103050137.000|20110103050139.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO WORK AS HARD AS YOU 
20110103050139.000|20110103050141.000|CC1|CAN TO GET IT RIGHT.            
20110103050141.000|20110103050142.000|CC1|>> WHY IS IT THAT WE HAVE AN    
20110103050142.000|20110103050143.000|CC1|ELEGANT, ASTONISHINGLY          
20110103050143.000|20110103050145.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL, IMPOSING, IMPRESSIVE 
20110103050145.000|20110103050146.000|CC1|STRUCTURE?                      
20110103050146.000|20110103050148.000|CC1|IT IS TO REMIND US THAT WE HAVE 
20110103050148.000|20110103050151.000|CC1|AN IMPORTANT FUNCTION AND TO    
20110103050151.000|20110103050154.000|CC1|REMIND THE PUBLIC THAT SEES THE 
20110103050154.000|20110103050156.000|CC1|BUILDING OF THE IMPORTANCE AND  
20110103050156.000|20110103050157.000|CC1|THE CENTRALITY OF THE LAW.      
20110103050157.000|20110103050159.000|CC1|>> IT ALL WAYS THRILLS ME,      
20110103050159.000|20110103050200.000|CC1|AMAZES ME, AND GIVES ME FAITH   
20110103050200.000|20110103050206.000|CC1|IN OUR COUNTRY TO KNOW HOW MUCH 
20110103050206.000|20110103050209.000|CC1|PEOPLE TRUST THE COURT.         
20110103050209.000|20110103050211.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE DANGER IS THAT   
20110103050211.000|20110103050213.000|CC1|SOMETIMES YOU COME INTO A       
20110103050213.000|20110103050216.000|CC1|BUILDING LIKE THIS AND THINK IT 
20110103050216.000|20110103050217.000|CC1|IS ALL ABOUT YOU OR THAT YOU    
20110103050217.000|20110103050219.000|CC1|ARE IMPORTANT.                  
20110103050219.000|20110103050221.000|CC1|AND THAT IS SOMETHING THAT I    
20110103050221.000|20110103050222.000|CC1|DON'T THINK WORKS WELL WITH THIS
20110103050222.000|20110103050237.000|CC1|JOB.                            
20110103050237.000|20110103050240.000|CC1|>> HOME TO AMERICA'S HIGHEST    
20110103050240.000|20110103050241.000|CC1|COURT, THE ROLE OF THOSE WHO    
20110103050241.000|20110103050243.000|CC1|SERVE HERE IS TO INTERPRET THE  
20110103050243.000|20110103050244.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION OF THE UNITED      
20110103050244.000|20110103050246.000|CC1|STATES.                         
20110103050246.000|20110103050247.000|CC1|OUTSIDE, ALMOST DAILY           
20110103050247.000|20110103050250.000|CC1|EXPRESSIONS OF PROTEST ARE MADE 
20110103050250.000|20110103050251.000|CC1|BY THOSE WISHING THE COURT TO   
20110103050251.000|20110103050253.000|CC1|PICK UP THEIR CASE OR ROLE IN   
20110103050253.000|20110103050256.000|CC1|THEIR FAVOR.                    
20110103050256.000|20110103050257.000|CC1|INSIDE, A CENTRAL SPACE THAT    
20110103050257.000|20110103050259.000|CC1|DOMINATES ITS PROCEEDINGS.      
20110103050259.000|20110103050301.000|CC1|ALL AROUND, THERE ARE BOTH      
20110103050301.000|20110103050303.000|CC1|PUBLIC SPACES CONTAINING THE    
20110103050303.000|20110103050311.000|CC1|SYMBOLISM OF THE LAW AND THOSE  
20110103050311.000|20110103050313.000|CC1|-- AND ARTWORK REMINDING US OF  
20110103050313.000|20110103050315.000|CC1|THOSE THAT HAVE SERVED IN THE   
20110103050315.000|20110103050316.000|CC1|COURT BEFORE AS WELL AS         
20110103050316.000|20110103050317.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL PRIVATE ROOMS THAT ARE
20110103050317.000|20110103050318.000|CC1|SEEN BY THOSE PRIVILEGED FEW.   
20110103050318.000|20110103050320.000|CC1|IT IS THE JUSTICES, APPOINTED   
20110103050320.000|20110103050321.000|CC1|FOR LIFE TERMS, THAT HAVE       
20110103050321.000|20110103050323.000|CC1|ALWAYS DEFINED IT AS A REGAL,   
20110103050323.000|20110103050326.000|CC1|VERY HUMAN INSTITUTION, AND THE 
20110103050326.000|20110103050327.000|CC1|BUILDING IN WHICH THEY DO THEIR 
20110103050327.000|20110103050328.000|CC1|WORK.                           
20110103050328.000|20110103050330.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT IS THE PRETTIEST  
20110103050330.000|20110103050331.000|CC1|BUILDING IN WASHINGTON.         
20110103050331.000|20110103050332.000|CC1|AND IT IS DISTINCTIVE.          
20110103050332.000|20110103050334.000|CC1|IT IS THAT DIFFERENT TYPE OF    
20110103050334.000|20110103050336.000|CC1|MARBLE, MUCH BRIGHTER, MUCH     
20110103050336.000|20110103050337.000|CC1|LIGHTER THAN THE TYPICAL        
20110103050337.000|20110103050338.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BUILDING, WHICH I    
20110103050338.000|20110103050341.000|CC1|THINK IS WONDERFUL.             
20110103050341.000|20110103050342.000|CC1|AS SOON AS YOU SEE IT, YOU      
20110103050342.000|20110103050344.000|CC1|APPRECIATE THAT THIS IS         
20110103050344.000|20110103050344.000|CC1|SOMETHING DIFFERENT.            
20110103050344.000|20110103050345.000|CC1|IT RECOGNIZES THAT THE COURT IS 
20110103050345.000|20110103050347.000|CC1|A DIFFERENT BRANCH OF           
20110103050347.000|20110103050348.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT.                     
20110103050348.000|20110103050350.000|CC1|IT IS MONUMENTAL.               
20110103050350.000|20110103050355.000|CC1|IT LOOKS MORE LIKE THE LINCOLN  
20110103050355.000|20110103050356.000|CC1|-- JEFFERSON MEMORIAL OR THE    
20110103050356.000|20110103050358.000|CC1|LINCOLN MEMORIAL IN TERMS OF ITS
20110103050358.000|20110103050400.000|CC1|VISUAL IMPACT THAN IT DOES LOOK 
20110103050400.000|20110103050400.000|CC1|LIKE ANOTHER GOVERNMENT         
20110103050400.000|20110103050401.000|CC1|BUILDING.                       
20110103050401.000|20110103050403.000|CC1|IF YOU WOULD LIKE SOMETHING     
20110103050403.000|20110103050408.000|CC1|LIKE -- VIEW IT SOMETHING LIKE A
20110103050408.000|20110103050409.000|CC1|TEMPLE OF JUSTICE, I THINK THAT 
20110103050409.000|20110103050410.000|CC1|IS ENTIRELY APPROPRIATE.        
20110103050410.000|20110103050411.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU FIRST COME UP TO    
20110103050411.000|20110103050413.000|CC1|THE COURT, THERE ARE TWO        
20110103050413.000|20110103050415.000|CC1|CANDELABRAE ON EITHER SIDE.     
20110103050415.000|20110103050418.000|CC1|THEY HAVE SOME OF YOUR FIRST    
20110103050418.000|20110103050419.000|CC1|SYMBOLS, OF BLINDFOLDED JUSTICE 
20110103050419.000|20110103050422.000|CC1|HOLDING THE SCALES OF JUSTICE.  
20110103050422.000|20110103050425.000|CC1|ON THE OTHER PART OF THAT ARE   
20110103050425.000|20110103050425.000|CC1|THE THREE FATES.                
20110103050425.000|20110103050427.000|CC1|IT IS THE FIRST SYMBOLIC        
20110103050427.000|20110103050428.000|CC1|INDICATION THAT THIS BUILDING   
20110103050428.000|20110103050429.000|CC1|HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH THE    
20110103050429.000|20110103050431.000|CC1|LAW.                            
20110103050431.000|20110103050435.000|CC1|AND AS YOU TRAVEL ON, THERE ARE 
20110103050435.000|20110103050437.000|CC1|THE FLAGPOLE BASES WHICH HAVE   
20110103050437.000|20110103050439.000|CC1|SOME SYMBOLS OF LAW AND         
20110103050439.000|20110103050441.000|CC1|KNOWLEDGE INDICATING THAT THE   
20110103050441.000|20110103050446.000|CC1|BUILDING HAS A PURPOSE TO THE --
20110103050446.000|20110103050449.000|CC1|WHICH IS THE SUPREME COURT AND  
20110103050449.000|20110103050453.000|CC1|THE LAW.                        
20110103050453.000|20110103050454.000|CC1|>> THE STATUE TO THE LEFT IS    
20110103050454.000|20110103050456.000|CC1|CONTEMPLATION OF JUSTICE.       
20110103050456.000|20110103050457.000|CC1|IN HER RIGHT HAND, SHE HOLDS A  
20110103050457.000|20110103050459.000|CC1|SMALL STATUE OF BLINDFOLDED     
20110103050459.000|20110103050501.000|CC1|JUSTICE.                        
20110103050501.000|20110103050507.000|CC1|IT IS A SYMBOL OF IMPARTIALITY. 
20110103050507.000|20110103050509.000|CC1|ON THE RIGHT-HAND SIDE OF THE   
20110103050509.000|20110103050512.000|CC1|STAIRCASE, THE OTHER STATUTE IS 
20110103050512.000|20110103050521.000|CC1|AUTHORITY OF LAW.               
20110103050521.000|20110103050523.000|CC1|THE LEFT ARMRESTS ON A BOOK.    
20110103050523.000|20110103050529.000|CC1|THE LATIN WORD LEX MEANS LAW.   
20110103050529.000|20110103050530.000|CC1|>> WE ALWAYS WANT TO MAKE SURE  
20110103050530.000|20110103050531.000|CC1|THAT PEOPLE WANT TO COME UP THE 
20110103050531.000|20110103050533.000|CC1|STEPS BECAUSE WE DO THE JOB THE 
20110103050533.000|20110103050534.000|CC1|RIGHT WAY.                      
20110103050534.000|20110103050536.000|CC1|THERE'S NOT A DAY THAT GOES BY  
20110103050536.000|20110103050537.000|CC1|THAT WE SHOULD NOT ASK          
20110103050537.000|20110103050538.000|CC1|OURSELVES, "ARE WE DOING THIS   
20110103050538.000|20110103050545.000|CC1|RIGHT?"                         
20110103050545.000|20110103050547.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE SUPREME COURT IS 
20110103050547.000|20110103050549.000|CC1|THE MOST MYSTERIOUS BRANCH TO   
20110103050549.000|20110103050549.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC.                     
20110103050549.000|20110103050551.000|CC1|>> THEY DO THEIR WORK IN A      
20110103050551.000|20110103050552.000|CC1|MARBLE BUILDING WHERE CAMERAS   
20110103050552.000|20110103050552.000|CC1|ARE NOT ALLOWED.                
20110103050552.000|20110103050554.000|CC1|THEY ARE NOT RECOGNIZABLE       
20110103050554.000|20110103050555.000|CC1|GENERALLY TO THE AVERAGE PERSON 
20110103050555.000|20110103050556.000|CC1|ON THE STREET.                  
20110103050556.000|20110103050557.000|CC1|AND THEN THEY SPEAK TO THE      
20110103050557.000|20110103050600.000|CC1|PUBLIC FOR THEIR OPINIONS.      
20110103050600.000|20110103050606.000|CC1|-- THROUGH THEIR OPINIONS.      
20110103050606.000|20110103050608.000|CC1|SO IN SOME WAYS, THEY ARE VERY  
20110103050608.000|20110103050608.000|CC1|PUBLIC.                         
20110103050608.000|20110103050609.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT THEY DO THAT WILL 
20110103050609.000|20110103050610.000|CC1|MATTER IN YOUR LIFE WILL BE DOWN
20110103050610.000|20110103050611.000|CC1|ON BLACK AND WHITE IN A COURT   
20110103050611.000|20110103050612.000|CC1|OPINION.                        
20110103050612.000|20110103050613.000|CC1|BUT THEY THEMSELVES WILL NOT BE 
20110103050613.000|20110103050614.000|CC1|PUBLICLY ANNOUNCING THAT BEFORE 
20110103050614.000|20110103050615.000|CC1|A CAMERA.                       
20110103050615.000|20110103050616.000|CC1|THERE IS A REAL MYSTERY TO THE  
20110103050616.000|20110103050616.000|CC1|SUPREME COURT.                  
20110103050616.000|20110103050619.000|CC1|>> THE ROLE IN OUR DEMOCRACY IS 
20110103050619.000|20110103050620.000|CC1|TO GIVE A FAIR AND HONEST       
20110103050620.000|20110103050621.000|CC1|INTERPRETATION TO THE MEANING   
20110103050621.000|20110103050623.000|CC1|OF DISPOSITIONS THAT THE PEOPLE 
20110103050623.000|20110103050625.000|CC1|HAVE ADOPTED, EITHER CONGRESS   
20110103050625.000|20110103050627.000|CC1|IN STATUTES OR THE PEOPLE WHEN  
20110103050627.000|20110103050631.000|CC1|THEY RATIFIED THE CONSTITUTION. 
20110103050631.000|20110103050632.000|CC1|SIMPLE AS THAT, NO MORE, NO     
20110103050632.000|20110103050634.000|CC1|LESS.                           
20110103050634.000|20110103050636.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT IS TIME THAT      
20110103050636.000|20110103050638.000|CC1|AMERICANS WAKE UP TO WHAT IT IS 
20110103050638.000|20110103050640.000|CC1|THE FRAMERS HAD IN MIND WHEN    
20110103050640.000|20110103050641.000|CC1|THEY TRIED TO CREATE AN         
20110103050641.000|20110103050644.000|CC1|INDEPENDENT FEDERAL JUDICIARY   
20110103050644.000|20110103050645.000|CC1|BRANCH.                         
20110103050645.000|20110103050647.000|CC1|THEY HAD A CLEAR VISION IN MIND 
20110103050647.000|20110103050649.000|CC1|AND THAT WAS THAT THE FEDERAL   
20110103050649.000|20110103050653.000|CC1|COURTS WOULD BE DECIDING ISSUES 
20110103050653.000|20110103050655.000|CC1|OF FEDERAL LAW, CONSTITUTIONAL  
20110103050655.000|20110103050700.000|CC1|AND STATUTORY, AND THAT THOSE   
20110103050700.000|20110103050703.000|CC1|JUDGMENTS WOULD BE BINDING ON   
20110103050703.000|20110103050705.000|CC1|ALL COURTS, STATE AND FEDERAL.  
20110103050705.000|20110103050707.000|CC1|>> WHEN THE COURT TRIES TO DO   
20110103050707.000|20110103050710.000|CC1|THAT JOB, SOMETIMES MEMBERS     
20110103050710.000|20110103050714.000|CC1|DISAGREE STRONGLY ABOUT, THEY   
20110103050714.000|20110103050716.000|CC1|ARE ALL TRYING TO DO THE SAME   
20110103050716.000|20110103050718.000|CC1|THING -- TO LOOK AT ALL LAWS    
20110103050718.000|20110103050720.000|CC1|THAT EXIST, THE CONSTITUTIONS,  
20110103050720.000|20110103050721.000|CC1|THE STATUTES, TO FIGURE OUT     
20110103050721.000|20110103050725.000|CC1|WHAT IT MEANS AND ENFORCE IT.   
20110103050725.000|20110103050727.000|CC1|WHAT THE PUBLIC WILL SEE        
20110103050727.000|20110103050729.000|CC1|EVENTUALLY IS AN OPINION WITH   
20110103050729.000|20110103050731.000|CC1|REASONS.                        
20110103050731.000|20110103050736.000|CC1|THE DISCIPLINE THAT A JUDGE     
20110103050736.000|20110103050737.000|CC1|FOLLOWS AND WHAT MAKES IT       
20110103050737.000|20110103050740.000|CC1|UNLIKE LEGISLATORS, WE HAVE TO  
20110103050740.000|20110103050749.000|CC1|GIVE REASONS FOR EVERY DECISIONS
20110103050749.000|20110103050753.000|CC1|THAT WE MAKE.                   
20110103050753.000|20110103050755.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU GO IN FOR A BIG     
20110103050755.000|20110103050756.000|CC1|CASE, HIGH-VISIBILITY, WHERE    
20110103050756.000|20110103050759.000|CC1|THE STAKES ARE LARGE, WHERE YOU 
20110103050759.000|20110103050802.000|CC1|CAN FEEL THE TECTONIC PLATES OF 
20110103050802.000|20110103050804.000|CC1|THE CONSTITUTION ACTUALLY       
20110103050804.000|20110103050807.000|CC1|BEGINNING OR POTENTIALLY        
20110103050807.000|20110103050808.000|CC1|BEGINNING TO SHIFT, YOU WOULD   
20110103050808.000|20110103050811.000|CC1|JUST BE BRUTISH IF YOU DID NOT  
20110103050811.000|20110103050812.000|CC1|HAVE AN AWARENESS OF WHAT A HIGH
20110103050812.000|20110103050814.000|CC1|LEVEL OF SENSITIVITY TO THE     
20110103050814.000|20110103050819.000|CC1|IMPORTANCE OF THAT MOMENT.      
20110103050819.000|20110103050821.000|CC1|>> THE COURT IS VERY MUCH AWARE 
20110103050821.000|20110103050822.000|CC1|OF HISTORY.                     
20110103050822.000|20110103050824.000|CC1|THE PLACE IS ONE WHERE          
20110103050824.000|20110103050827.000|CC1|CONTINUITY IS VERY IMPORTANT,   
20110103050827.000|20110103050828.000|CC1|AND HISTORY REALLY DOES         
20110103050828.000|20110103050830.000|CC1|INFLUENCE THE WAY THE COURT     
20110103050830.000|20110103050832.000|CC1|WORKS.                          
20110103050832.000|20110103050835.000|CC1|>> AT TOP OF THE WEST STEP, THE 
20110103050835.000|20110103050837.000|CC1|SYMBOLIC BRONZE DOORS WHICH     
20110103050837.000|20110103050838.000|CC1|RECOGNIZE THE HISTORY OF THE    
20110103050838.000|20110103050845.000|CC1|LAW.                            
20110103050845.000|20110103050848.000|CC1|JUST ON THE OTHER SIDE IS THE   
20110103050848.000|20110103050849.000|CC1|CEREMONIAL CORE OF THE BUILDING.
20110103050849.000|20110103050851.000|CC1|>> THERE IS AN IMPRESSIVE       
20110103050851.000|20110103050852.000|CC1|MARBLE HALL THAT SEPARATES THE  
20110103050852.000|20110103050853.000|CC1|FRONT DOORS OF THE BUILDING FROM
20110103050853.000|20110103050854.000|CC1|THE DOORS THAT LEAD INTO THE    
20110103050854.000|20110103050855.000|CC1|COURT ROOM.                     
20110103050855.000|20110103050856.000|CC1|THAT MARBLE HALL IS CALLED THE  
20110103050856.000|20110103050857.000|CC1|GREAT HALL, AND IS              
20110103050857.000|20110103050859.000|CC1|CHARACTERIZED BY MARBLE COLUMNS 
20110103050859.000|20110103050903.000|CC1|-- AND OFTEN WHEN I GO HOME AT  
20110103050903.000|20110103050905.000|CC1|NIGHT, THE BUILDING IS VACANT   
20110103050905.000|20110103050907.000|CC1|AND I WALK THROUGH THE GREAT    
20110103050907.000|20110103050909.000|CC1|HALL AND I LOOK AROUND AT THE   
20110103050909.000|20110103050911.000|CC1|PILLARS.                        
20110103050911.000|20110103050913.000|CC1|IT REALLY IMPRESSES UPON ME THE 
20110103050913.000|20110103050914.000|CC1|IMPORTANCE OF THE WORK THAT WE  
20110103050914.000|20110103050915.000|CC1|ARE DOING.                      
20110103050915.000|20110103050917.000|CC1|AS MANY TIMES AS I WALKED       
20110103050917.000|20110103050919.000|CC1|THROUGH THAT HALL, IT NEVER     
20110103050919.000|20110103050921.000|CC1|CEASES TO HAVE THAT IMPRESSION  
20110103050921.000|20110103050923.000|CC1|ON ME.                          
20110103050923.000|20110103050924.000|CC1|>> BETWEEN THE COLUMNS ARE      
20110103050924.000|20110103050926.000|CC1|BUSTS OF PREVIOUS CHIEF         
20110103050926.000|20110103050927.000|CC1|JUSTICES.                       
20110103050927.000|20110103050931.000|CC1|AS YOU WALK FROM THE BEGINNING, 
20110103050931.000|20110103050935.000|CC1|YOU CAN SEE JOHN MARSHALL,      
20110103050935.000|20110103050940.000|CC1|TANEY, TAFT, CHARLES EVANS      
20110103050940.000|20110103050949.000|CC1|HUGHES, EARL WARREN, AND AT     
20110103050949.000|20110103050951.000|CC1|PRESENT THERE ARE BUSTS OF ALL  
20110103050951.000|20110103050954.000|CC1|OF THE CHIEF JUSTICES.          
20110103050954.000|20110103050956.000|CC1|IN A CERTAIN SENSE, YOU ARE     
20110103050956.000|20110103050958.000|CC1|WALKING THROUGH THE WHOLE       
20110103050958.000|20110103051001.000|CC1|HISTORY OF THE COURT.           
20110103051001.000|20110103051002.000|CC1|>> THE STORY OF THE COURT IS    
20110103051002.000|20110103051005.000|CC1|DEFINED NOT ONLY BY ITS         
20110103051005.000|20110103051007.000|CC1|DIFFERENT SHAPES OVER TIME BUT  
20110103051007.000|20110103051008.000|CC1|THROUGH A CONTINUAL ADDITION OF 
20110103051008.000|20110103051010.000|CC1|NEW ASSOCIATE JUSTICES TO THE   
20110103051010.000|20110103051012.000|CC1|BENCH.                          
20110103051012.000|20110103051014.000|CC1|>> THE WHITE HOUSE OPERATOR     
20110103051014.000|20110103051015.000|CC1|TELLS YOU THAT THE PRESIDENT IS 
20110103051015.000|20110103051016.000|CC1|ON THE LINE.                    
20110103051016.000|20110103051022.000|CC1|I HAD MY CELL PHONE IN MY RIGHT 
20110103051022.000|20110103051023.000|CC1|HAND AND I HAD MY LEFT HAND     
20110103051023.000|20110103051025.000|CC1|OVER MY CHEST.                  
20110103051025.000|20110103051026.000|CC1|TRYING TO CALM MY BEATING       
20110103051026.000|20110103051030.000|CC1|HEART, LITERALLY.               
20110103051030.000|20110103051033.000|CC1|AND THE PRESIDENT GOT ON THE    
20110103051033.000|20110103051037.000|CC1|PHONE AND SAID TO ME, "JUDGE, I 
20110103051037.000|20110103051038.000|CC1|WOULD LIKE TO ANNOUNCE YOU AS   
20110103051038.000|20110103051042.000|CC1|MY SELECTION TO BE THE NEXT     
20110103051042.000|20110103051044.000|CC1|ASSOCIATE JUSTICE OF THE UNITED 
20110103051044.000|20110103051048.000|CC1|STATES SUPREME COURT."          
20110103051048.000|20110103051049.000|CC1|AND I SAID TO HIM -- I CAUGHT   
20110103051049.000|20110103051052.000|CC1|TO MY BREATH AND STARTED TO CRY 
20110103051052.000|20110103051055.000|CC1|AND SAID, "THANK YOU, MR.       
20110103051055.000|20110103051057.000|CC1|PRESIDENT."                     
20110103051057.000|20110103051059.000|CC1|>> JUSTICE SOTOMAYOR, ARE YOU   
20110103051059.000|20110103051102.000|CC1|READY TO TAKE THE OATH?         
20110103051102.000|20110103051104.000|CC1|REPEAT AFTER ME.                
20110103051104.000|20110103051106.000|CC1|I, SONIA SOTOMAYOR, DO SOLEMNLY 
20110103051106.000|20110103051107.000|CC1|SWEAR --                        
20110103051107.000|20110103051110.000|CC1|>> I, SONIA SOTOMAYOR, DO       
20110103051110.000|20110103051111.000|CC1|SOLEMNLY SWEAR --               
20110103051111.000|20110103051114.000|CC1|>> WHEN THE COURT GETS A NEW    
20110103051114.000|20110103051116.000|CC1|MEMBER, IT CHANGES EVERYTHING,  
20110103051116.000|20110103051123.000|CC1|EVERYBODY.                      
20110103051123.000|20110103051128.000|CC1|SIMPLE CHANGES.                 
20110103051128.000|20110103051130.000|CC1|WE MOVE THE SEATS AROUND IN THE 
20110103051130.000|20110103051131.000|CC1|COURT ROOM BY SENIORITY.        
20110103051131.000|20110103051131.000|CC1|THERE WILL BE A SHIFT THERE.    
20110103051131.000|20110103051133.000|CC1|BUT MORE FUNDAMENTALLY, IT CAN  
20110103051133.000|20110103051134.000|CC1|CAUSE IT TO TAKE A FRESH LOOK AT
20110103051134.000|20110103051138.000|CC1|HOW THINGS ARE DEFINED.         
20110103051138.000|20110103051140.000|CC1|-- IT CAN CAUSE YOU TO TAKE A   
20110103051140.000|20110103051141.000|CC1|FRESH LOOK AT HOW THINGS ARE    
20110103051141.000|20110103051142.000|CC1|DECIDED.                        
20110103051142.000|20110103051144.000|CC1|THE NEW MEMBER WILL HAVE A      
20110103051144.000|20110103051145.000|CC1|PARTICULAR VIEW ABOUT HOW THINGS
20110103051145.000|20110103051146.000|CC1|SHOULD BE ADDRESSED, AND IT MAY 
20110103051146.000|20110103051147.000|CC1|BE VERY DIFFERENT FROM WHAT WE  
20110103051147.000|20110103051148.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN FOLLOWING FOR SOME    
20110103051148.000|20110103051149.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110103051149.000|20110103051150.000|CC1|IT IS AN EXCITING PART OF LIFE  
20110103051150.000|20110103051151.000|CC1|AT THE COURT.                   
20110103051151.000|20110103051152.000|CC1|>> THE INSTITUTION DOES NOT     
20110103051152.000|20110103051154.000|CC1|CHANGE AT ALL.                  
20110103051154.000|20110103051156.000|CC1|I THINK THE RELATIONSHIPS       
20110103051156.000|20110103051156.000|CC1|CHANGE.                         
20110103051156.000|20110103051158.000|CC1|YOU LOSE A FRIEND AND HOPEFULLY 
20110103051158.000|20110103051200.000|CC1|ACQUIRE ANOTHER ONE.            
20110103051200.000|20110103051203.000|CC1|I MISS A LOT OF MY FORMER       
20110103051203.000|20110103051205.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES ON THE COURT, FROM   
20110103051205.000|20110103051207.000|CC1|BLACKMUN, WHITE, TO BILL        
20110103051207.000|20110103051210.000|CC1|BRENNAN.                        
20110103051210.000|20110103051213.000|CC1|-- BYRON WHITE TO BILL BRENNAN. 
20110103051213.000|20110103051215.000|CC1|BUT THAT IS THE PROCESS.        
20110103051215.000|20110103051217.000|CC1|>> IT IS DIFFERENT TODAY THAN   
20110103051217.000|20110103051218.000|CC1|WHEN IT WAS WHEN I FIRST GOT    
20110103051218.000|20110103051219.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110103051219.000|20110103051220.000|CC1|I HAVE TO ADMIT -- YOU GROW     
20110103051220.000|20110103051221.000|CC1|VERY FOND OF THE COURT THAT YOU 
20110103051221.000|20110103051224.000|CC1|SPEND A LONG TIME ON.           
20110103051224.000|20110103051226.000|CC1|THERE WAS A PERIOD THERE WHEN   
20110103051226.000|20110103051228.000|CC1|CHIEF JUSTICE REHNQUIST AND     
20110103051228.000|20110103051232.000|CC1|JUSTICE O'CONNOR, WE HAD A LONG 
20110103051232.000|20110103051234.000|CC1|RUN TOGETHER.                   
20110103051234.000|20110103051236.000|CC1|YOU GET COMFORTABLE WITH THAT   
20110103051236.000|20110103051237.000|CC1|AND THEN IT CHANGES.            
20110103051237.000|20110103051240.000|CC1|AND NOW IT IS CHANGING AGAIN.   
20110103051240.000|20110103051243.000|CC1|>> IT IS A NEW COURT.           
20110103051243.000|20110103051247.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS TRYING JURY CASES,   
20110103051247.000|20110103051250.000|CC1|THE JUROR HAD TO BE REPLACED,   
20110103051250.000|20110103051253.000|CC1|BECAUSE ONE REASON, IT WAS A

20110103051254.000|20110103051255.000|CC1|DIFFERENT JURY.                 
20110103051255.000|20110103051257.000|CC1|AND THE SAME CASE -- THIS WILL  
20110103051257.000|20110103051258.000|CC1|BE A VERY DIFFERENT COURT.      
20110103051258.000|20110103051301.000|CC1|AND IT IS STRESSFUL FOR US      
20110103051301.000|20110103051303.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE SO ADMIRE OUR        
20110103051303.000|20110103051305.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES.                     
20110103051305.000|20110103051306.000|CC1|WE WONDER, WILL IT EVER BE THE

20110103051308.000|20110103051309.000|CC1|I HAVE GREAT ADMIRATION FOR THE 
20110103051309.000|20110103051310.000|CC1|SYSTEM.

20110103051312.000|20110103051313.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT IS HEALTHY FOR

20110103051336.000|20110103051338.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT WOULD BE VERY

20110103051339.000|20110103051342.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE EXPERIENCES THAT 
20110103051342.000|20110103051344.000|CC1|I'VE BROUGHT TO THE JOB ARE     
20110103051344.000|20110103051346.000|CC1|GOING TO HELP ME A GOOD DEAL.   
20110103051346.000|20110103051347.000|CC1|BEING SOLICITOR GENERAL, YOU

20110103051357.000|20110103051403.000|CC1|IT HAS BEEN A WHIRLWIND.        
20110103051403.000|20110103051405.000|CC1|DRINKING OUT OF A FIRE HOSE.

20110103051407.000|20110103051408.000|CC1|LOT TO LEARN, THE LEARNING

20110103051411.000|20110103051413.000|CC1|>> ALL OF MY COLLEAGUES HAVE

20110103051434.000|20110103051435.000|CC1|WHETHER I AM MEETING THEM IN THE

20110103051442.000|20110103051444.000|CC1|I GO WITH THE QUESTION ON MY

20110103051455.000|20110103051456.000|CC1|>> FROM ITS FIRST CHIEF

20110103051509.000|20110103051511.000|CC1|OF THOSE REQUESTED OF THEM.     
20110103051511.000|20110103051512.000|CC1|>> 8000 EACH YEAR ASK US TO     
20110103051512.000|20110103051518.000|CC1|HEAR THEIR CASE.                
20110103051518.000|20110103051521.000|CC1|THAT MEANS ABOUT 150 WEEK.      
20110103051521.000|20110103051523.000|CC1|150 WHAT?                       
20110103051523.000|20110103051524.000|CC1|150 REQUESTS TO HEAR THE CASE.  
20110103051524.000|20110103051526.000|CC1|HERE THEY ARE FOR THIS WEEK.    
20110103051526.000|20110103051531.000|CC1|>> I THINK UNDOUBTEDLY TO MY    
20110103051531.000|20110103051537.000|CC1|MIND, THE MOST ONEROUS, AND FOR 
20110103051537.000|20110103051538.000|CC1|THE MOST PART, THE

20110103051543.000|20110103051545.000|CC1|THAT COME TO THE COURT.

20110103051554.000|20110103051555.000|CC1|TIME I HAVE BEEN HERE.          
20110103051555.000|20110103051557.000|CC1|>> WE DON'T LOOK AT THE CASES   
20110103051557.000|20110103051558.000|CC1|THAT WE THINK ARE WRONG.        
20110103051558.000|20110103051559.000|CC1|WE DON'T THINK OF THE CASES THAT
20110103051559.000|20110103051600.000|CC1|HAVE A LOT AT STAKE.

20110103051602.000|20110103051605.000|CC1|ALL OF THE CASES ARE HARD.

20110103051607.000|20110103051609.000|CC1|AND SOME OF MY COLLEAGUES MAY   
20110103051609.000|20110103051611.000|CC1|TELL YOU, IS THAT OTHER COURTS  
20110103051611.000|20110103051615.000|CC1|ARE IN DISAGREEMENT.            
20110103051615.000|20110103051616.000|CC1|THAT MEANS THAT OTHER JUDGES    
20110103051616.000|20110103051620.000|CC1|AND OTHER ACTORS IN THE LEGAL   
20110103051620.000|20110103051623.000|CC1|SYSTEM HAVE COME TO DIFFERENT   
20110103051623.000|20110103051624.000|CC1|CONCLUSIONS.                    
20110103051624.000|20110103051626.000|CC1|EVERY CASE IS THAT WAY.         
20110103051626.000|20110103051627.000|CC1|>> MOST PEOPLE THINK THEY HAVE A
20110103051627.000|20110103051629.000|CC1|RIGHT TO COME TO THE COURT.     
20110103051629.000|20110103051631.000|CC1|FOR THE MOST PART YOU DO NOT.

20110103051632.000|20110103051634.000|CC1|MAYBE THE COURT OF APPEALS, YOU 
20110103051634.000|20110103051635.000|CC1|NORMALLY DO.                    
20110103051635.000|20110103051638.000|CC1|MAYBE THE STATE COURTS OF       
20110103051638.000|20110103051642.000|CC1|APPEAL, THE COURTS THAT DO NOT  
20110103051642.000|20110103051643.000|CC1|HAVE DISCRETIONARY JURISDICTION.
20110103051643.000|20110103051646.000|CC1|THE COURT OF LAST RESORT, MAYBE 
20110103051646.000|20110103051650.000|CC1|THEY HAVE A RIGHT TO GO THERE,  
20110103051650.000|20110103051650.000|CC1|BUT OUR JURISDICTION IS         
20110103051650.000|20110103051652.000|CC1|DISCRETIONARY.                  
20110103051652.000|20110103051654.000|CC1|WE DECIDE WHO CAN COME.         
20110103051654.000|20110103051656.000|CC1|>> YOU CAN TELL WHEN THERE IS A 
20110103051656.000|20110103051657.000|CC1|CASE WITH A PARTICULAR HOT-     
20110103051657.000|20110103051658.000|CC1|BUTTON ISSUE THAT WILL GET A    
20110103051658.000|20110103051700.000|CC1|LOT OF ATTENTION.               
20110103051700.000|20110103051702.000|CC1|BUT I HAVE TO SAY THAT DOES NOT 
20110103051702.000|20110103051703.000|CC1|ENTER INTO OUR PROCESS OF       
20110103051703.000|20110103051705.000|CC1|DECIDING.                       
20110103051705.000|20110103051706.000|CC1|A LOT OF OUR DOCKET IS VERY     
20110103051706.000|20110103051711.000|CC1|MUNDANE.                        
20110103051711.000|20110103051713.000|CC1|OUT OF 90 CASES, MAYBE A HALF A 
20110103051713.000|20110103051714.000|CC1|DOZEN WILL MAKE IT TO THE FRONT 
20110103051714.000|20110103051716.000|CC1|PAGES.                          
20110103051716.000|20110103051718.000|CC1|OTHERS ARE BANKRUPTCY AND TAX   
20110103051718.000|20110103051721.000|CC1|CASES, THE FEDERAL ARBITRATION  
20110103051721.000|20110103051722.000|CC1|ACT CASES, THAT IS A BIG PART   
20110103051722.000|20110103051727.000|CC1|OF OUR DOCKET.                  
20110103051727.000|20110103051729.000|CC1|ALL VITALLY IMPORTANT, BUT NOT  
20110103051729.000|20110103051730.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT WILL ATTRACT      
20110103051730.000|20110103051732.000|CC1|INTEREST.                       
20110103051732.000|20110103051733.000|CC1|>> EVEN A CASE ON A SUBJECT     
20110103051733.000|20110103051737.000|CC1|THAT YOU THINK OF AS BORING CAN 
20110103051737.000|20110103051738.000|CC1|TURN OUT TO BE ENORMOUSLY       
20110103051738.000|20110103051740.000|CC1|CHALLENGING AT THE END OF THE   
20110103051740.000|20110103051741.000|CC1|DAY.                            
20110103051741.000|20110103051745.000|CC1|IT COULD BE ANYTHING.           
20110103051745.000|20110103051747.000|CC1|I DO NOT THINK SUBJECT MATTER   
20110103051747.000|20110103051749.000|CC1|DETERMINES OUR INTEREST IN IT.  
20110103051749.000|20110103051752.000|CC1|IT IS THE CHALLENGE OF SOLVING  
20110103051752.000|20110103051755.000|CC1|THIS PARTICULAR QUESTION OF THE 
20110103051755.000|20110103051755.000|CC1|LAW AND MAKING IT WORK.         
20110103051755.000|20110103051759.000|CC1|IT CAN BE ON ANY SUBJECT.       
20110103051759.000|20110103051800.000|CC1|>> EACH ONE GETS A VOTE LIKE    
20110103051800.000|20110103051801.000|CC1|ANYONE ELSE ON WHAT CASES WE    
20110103051801.000|20110103051801.000|CC1|SHOULD HEAR.                    
20110103051801.000|20110103051804.000|CC1|BUT IT TAKES FOUR VOTES TO      
20110103051804.000|20110103051806.000|CC1|DECIDE IF WE HEAR A CASE.       
20110103051806.000|20110103051808.000|CC1|WE USED TO HAVE A LOT MORE      
20110103051808.000|20110103051813.000|CC1|MANDATORY JURISDICTION CASES.   
20110103051813.000|20110103051815.000|CC1|WHEN THEY GOT CONGRESS TO PASS A
20110103051815.000|20110103051815.000|CC1|LAW AND SAY WE DID NOT HAVE TO  
20110103051815.000|20110103051820.000|CC1|HEAR ALL THE CASES, PART OF THE 
20110103051820.000|20110103051823.000|CC1|TRADE-OFF WAS THAT YOU DID NOT  
20110103051823.000|20110103051825.000|CC1|-- PART OF THE DEAL THAT WE MADE
20110103051825.000|20110103051828.000|CC1|WAS THAT YOU DID NOT HAVE TO    
20110103051828.000|20110103051829.000|CC1|HAVE FIVE VOTES TO HEAR A CASE, 
20110103051829.000|20110103051830.000|CC1|FOUR WOULD BE ENOUGH.           
20110103051830.000|20110103051830.000|CC1|>> THESE ARE THE CASES IN       
20110103051830.000|20110103051832.000|CC1|STEPHEN BREYER'S OFFICE THAT    
20110103051832.000|20110103051835.000|CC1|WERE HEARD IN THE COURTROOM.    
20110103051835.000|20110103051838.000|CC1|BEHIND-THE-SCENES, EACH JUSTICE 
20110103051838.000|20110103051839.000|CC1|HAS THEIR OWN SUITE OF OFFICES. 
20110103051839.000|20110103051841.000|CC1|HERE THEY WORK WITH THE STAFF OF
20110103051841.000|20110103051842.000|CC1|FOUR LAW CLERKS AND SEVERAL     
20110103051842.000|20110103051842.000|CC1|OFFICE ASSISTANTS.              
20110103051842.000|20110103051844.000|CC1|IT IS WITHIN THE ROOM OF        
20110103051844.000|20110103051845.000|CC1|CHAMBERS WHERE THEIR            
20110103051845.000|20110103051846.000|CC1|PERSONALITIES AND WORK HABITS   
20110103051846.000|20110103051847.000|CC1|COME THROUGH.                   
20110103051847.000|20110103051848.000|CC1|>> I LIKE TO WORK IN A QUIET    
20110103051848.000|20110103051850.000|CC1|PLACE.                          
20110103051850.000|20110103051852.000|CC1|I LIKE TO HAVE THE LAW CLERKS   
20110103051852.000|20110103051853.000|CC1|CLOSE AT HAND.                  
20110103051853.000|20110103051855.000|CC1|IN MY REGULAR CHAMBERS, ALL OF  
20110103051855.000|20110103051859.000|CC1|THE LAW CLERKS WERE INSIDE.     
20110103051859.000|20110103051907.000|CC1|NOW I HAVE TO TWO IN MY OFFICE. 
20110103051907.000|20110103051909.000|CC1|AND TO DOWN THE HALL.           
20110103051909.000|20110103051910.000|CC1|BUT I LIKE A QUIET PLACE AND I  
20110103051910.000|20110103051911.000|CC1|LIKE TO BE OVERLOOKING THE      
20110103051911.000|20110103051914.000|CC1|COURTYARD.                      
20110103051914.000|20110103051916.000|CC1|AND NOT IN FRONT OF THE BUILDING
20110103051916.000|20110103051919.000|CC1|SO I'M NOT DISTURBED BY THE     
20110103051919.000|20110103051923.000|CC1|PROTESTERS.                     
20110103051923.000|20110103051924.000|CC1|THIS DESK WAS MADE HERE AT THE  
20110103051924.000|20110103051925.000|CC1|COURT.                          
20110103051925.000|20110103051926.000|CC1|ALL OF THE CHAMBERS HAVE SIMILAR
20110103051926.000|20110103051927.000|CC1|DESKS.                          
20110103051927.000|20110103051928.000|CC1|THE ONE IN THIS CHAMBERS IS     
20110103051928.000|20110103051930.000|CC1|WHERE I PUT A GRANITE TOP ON THE
20110103051930.000|20110103051931.000|CC1|TOP.                            
20110103051931.000|20110103051931.000|CC1|>> I WAS VERY LUCKY TO HAVE THIS
20110103051931.000|20110103051932.000|CC1|OFFICE.                         
20110103051932.000|20110103051933.000|CC1|BLACKMUN WAS MY PREDECESSOR,    
20110103051933.000|20110103051940.000|CC1|AND IT WAS A LOVELY OFFICE.     
20110103051940.000|20110103051942.000|CC1|THE YEAR BOTH FOR RUTH GINSBURG 
20110103051942.000|20110103051943.000|CC1|WAS APPOINTED.                  
20110103051943.000|20110103051945.000|CC1|EVERYBODY MOVED AND OBTAINED    
20110103051945.000|20110103051948.000|CC1|OFFICES BY SENIORITY.           
20110103051948.000|20110103051949.000|CC1|I WAS THE MOST JUNIOR.          
20110103051949.000|20110103051950.000|CC1|BUT WHEN I WAS APPOINTED, NO    
20110103051950.000|20110103051951.000|CC1|ONE WANTED TO MOVE.             
20110103051951.000|20110103051952.000|CC1|I SAID, THAT IS FINE WITH ME.   
20110103051952.000|20110103051956.000|CC1|I LIKE IT.                      
20110103051956.000|20110103051958.000|CC1|-- I WAS LUCKY.                 
20110103051958.000|20110103051959.000|CC1|>> IT IS THIS VIEW FROM JUSTICE 
20110103051959.000|20110103052000.000|CC1|BREYER'S CHAMBERS THAT PROVIDES 
20110103052000.000|20110103052001.000|CC1|A WINDOW INTO THE PAST OF THE   
20110103052001.000|20110103052004.000|CC1|SUPREME COURT.                  
20110103052004.000|20110103052006.000|CC1|MEETING IN THE BASEMENT OF THE  
20110103052006.000|20110103052008.000|CC1|CAPITOL FOR THE MAJORITY OF     
20110103052008.000|20110103052009.000|CC1|THEIR TIME BETWEEN 1810 AND     
20110103052009.000|20110103052012.000|CC1|1860, JOHN MARSHALL OVERSAW THE 
20110103052012.000|20110103052013.000|CC1|COURT FROM HERE DURING HIS      
20110103052013.000|20110103052016.000|CC1|TENURE.                         
20110103052016.000|20110103052017.000|CC1|LATER ROGER TANEY RULED OVER    
20110103052017.000|20110103052018.000|CC1|THE CHAMBER UNTIL THE COURT     
20110103052018.000|20110103052021.000|CC1|MOVED UPSTAIRS INTO A SPACE     
20110103052021.000|20110103052022.000|CC1|VACATED BY THE SENATE, WHERE    
20110103052022.000|20110103052029.000|CC1|THEY WOULD MEET UNTIL 1935.     
20110103052029.000|20110103052031.000|CC1|BUT WITH VERY LITTLE SPACE      
20110103052031.000|20110103052032.000|CC1|AVAILABLE IN THE BUILDING FOR   
20110103052032.000|20110103052034.000|CC1|JUSTICES TO DO THEIR WORK AND   
20110103052034.000|20110103052036.000|CC1|WITH EVEN LESS FOR ATTORNEYS TO 
20110103052036.000|20110103052037.000|CC1|FIND A PLACE TO PREPARE FOR     
20110103052037.000|20110103052038.000|CC1|ORAL ARGUMENT, ONE CHIEF        
20110103052038.000|20110103052040.000|CC1|JUSTICE DETERMINED IT WAS TIME  
20110103052040.000|20110103052041.000|CC1|THE COURT HAD A BUILDING OF ITS 
20110103052041.000|20110103052045.000|CC1|OWN.                            
20110103052045.000|20110103052047.000|CC1|>> I DO NOT THINK IS AN         
20110103052047.000|20110103052048.000|CC1|UNDERSTATEMENT TO SAY THAT THIS 
20110103052048.000|20110103052049.000|CC1|BUILDING WOULD NOT BE HERE IF IT
20110103052049.000|20110103052050.000|CC1|HAD NOT BEEN FOR THE            
20110103052050.000|20110103052051.000|CC1|PERSISTENCE OF CHIEF JUSTICE    
20110103052051.000|20110103052051.000|CC1|TAFT.                           
20110103052051.000|20110103052054.000|CC1|>> TAFT HAD IN MIND THAT IT HAD 
20110103052054.000|20110103052058.000|CC1|A OF BUILDING OF ITS OWN.       
20110103052058.000|20110103052100.000|CC1|-- THAT THE COURT NEEDED TO HAVE
20110103052100.000|20110103052101.000|CC1|A BUILDING OF ITS OWN.          
20110103052101.000|20110103052103.000|CC1|HE BELIEVED THAT AS PRESIDENT,  
20110103052103.000|20110103052104.000|CC1|AND WHEN HE BECAME CHIEF        
20110103052104.000|20110103052105.000|CC1|JUSTICE, IT BECAME ALMOST AN    
20110103052105.000|20110103052106.000|CC1|OBSESSION.                      
20110103052106.000|20110103052108.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS SOME OPPOSITION IN 
20110103052108.000|20110103052110.000|CC1|CONGRESS, BUT ULTIMATELY TAFT   
20110103052110.000|20110103052111.000|CC1|BEGAN TO SHOW THE COMMITTEE     
20110103052111.000|20110103052117.000|CC1|THEY -- CHAIR THE COMMITTEE     
20110103052117.000|20110103052120.000|CC1|THAT WOULD CHOOSE THE ARCHITECT,
20110103052120.000|20110103052121.000|CC1|GILBERT, VERY MUCH HIS FIRST    
20110103052121.000|20110103052122.000|CC1|CHOICE.                         
20110103052122.000|20110103052123.000|CC1|CASS GILBERT WAS ONE OF THE     
20110103052123.000|20110103052125.000|CC1|BEST KNOWN ARCHITECTS OF HIS    
20110103052125.000|20110103052125.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110103052125.000|20110103052127.000|CC1|IT WAS A PERFECT MATCH OF       
20110103052127.000|20110103052131.000|CC1|ARCHITECT AND EMPLOYER.         
20110103052131.000|20110103052132.000|CC1|TO DO THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO     
20110103052132.000|20110103052137.000|CC1|HAVE -- THEIR IDEA WAS TO HAVE  
20110103052137.000|20110103052139.000|CC1|THE A BUILDING THAT WOULD       
20110103052139.000|20110103052141.000|CC1|COMPORTED JEFFERSON'S CONCEPTS  
20110103052141.000|20110103052142.000|CC1|AND LOOK RIGHT NEXT TO THE      
20110103052142.000|20110103052143.000|CC1|CAPITOL BUILDING AND YET STILL  
20110103052143.000|20110103052144.000|CC1|STAND OUT ON ITS OWN.           
20110103052144.000|20110103052146.000|CC1|>> $10 MILLION, DURING THE      
20110103052146.000|20110103052151.000|CC1|GREAT -- THE APPROPRIATION TAFT 
20110103052151.000|20110103052153.000|CC1|ASKED FOR WAS $10 MILLION,      
20110103052153.000|20110103052154.000|CC1|DURING THE GREAT DEPRESSION,    
20110103052154.000|20110103052156.000|CC1|THERE WAS ACTUALLY DEFLATION.   
20110103052156.000|20110103052157.000|CC1|THEY WERE ABLE TO BUILD THE     
20110103052157.000|20110103052159.000|CC1|BUILDING AND FURNISHING IT AND  
20110103052159.000|20110103052200.000|CC1|STILL TURN $100,000 BACK TO THE 
20110103052200.000|20110103052202.000|CC1|TREASURY OF THE UNITED STATES.  
20110103052202.000|20110103052204.000|CC1|IT CAME IN UNDER BUDGET.        
20110103052204.000|20110103052206.000|CC1|MAYBE THE ONLY GOVERNMENT       
20110103052206.000|20110103052207.000|CC1|BUILDING IN HISTORY THAT CAME   
20110103052207.000|20110103052210.000|CC1|IN UNDER BUDGET.                
20110103052210.000|20110103052211.000|CC1|>> THEY HAD DONE SUCH A GREAT   
20110103052211.000|20110103052214.000|CC1|JOB, THE U.S. CAPITOL SHOULD BE 
20110103052214.000|20110103052220.000|CC1|MOVED SO THAT IT WOULD HAVE A --
20110103052220.000|20110103052222.000|CC1|PEOPLE WOULD HAVE A BETTER VIEW 
20110103052222.000|20110103052222.000|CC1|OF THE COURT.                   
20110103052222.000|20110103052223.000|CC1|THAT WAS HIS VIEW.              
20110103052223.000|20110103052225.000|CC1|I THINK HE DID CREATE A         
20110103052225.000|20110103052225.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL BUILDING, BUT THERE   
20110103052225.000|20110103052227.000|CC1|IS NO WAY THAT CAPITOL BUILDING 
20110103052227.000|20110103052228.000|CC1|WOULD BE MOVED TO PROVIDE A     
20110103052228.000|20110103052229.000|CC1|BETTER VIEW.                    
20110103052229.000|20110103052232.000|CC1|>> IT IS A FRENCH CLASSICISM.   
20110103052232.000|20110103052234.000|CC1|HE WAS VERY SERIOUS IN HIS      
20110103052234.000|20110103052239.000|CC1|INTENTION TO CREATE A HOUSE, A  
20110103052239.000|20110103052241.000|CC1|SYMBOLIC HOUSE, FOR THE THIRD   
20110103052241.000|20110103052244.000|CC1|BRANCH OF GOVERNMENT THAT       
20110103052244.000|20110103052245.000|CC1|EXPRESSED THE SERIOUSNESS OF    
20110103052245.000|20110103052247.000|CC1|WHAT WE WERE DOING, THE         
20110103052247.000|20110103052248.000|CC1|AUTHORITY WITH WHICH THE THIRD  
20110103052248.000|20110103052252.000|CC1|BRANCH SHOULD BE INVESTED, AND  
20110103052252.000|20110103052253.000|CC1|AUTHORITY TO WORK FOR WHAT WAS  
20110103052253.000|20110103052255.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20110103052255.000|20110103052259.000|CC1|DID THE SUPREME COURT JUSTICES  
20110103052259.000|20110103052300.000|CC1|--                              
20110103052300.000|20110103052303.000|CC1|>> THE SUPREME COURT JUSTICES   
20110103052303.000|20110103052304.000|CC1|ARE NOT SHY.                    
20110103052304.000|20110103052306.000|CC1|SOME OF THE JUSTICES FELT THAT  
20110103052306.000|20110103052307.000|CC1|THE NEW BUILDING WAS TO GRAND,  
20110103052307.000|20110103052308.000|CC1|WAS TOO GRANDIOSE.              
20110103052308.000|20110103052309.000|CC1|CHIEF JUSTICE STONE IS ALLEGED  
20110103052309.000|20110103052315.000|CC1|TO OF SAND THAT JUSTICES WROTE  
20110103052315.000|20110103052317.000|CC1|-- ALLEGED TO HAVE SAID THAT THE
20110103052317.000|20110103052320.000|CC1|JUSTICES WERE LIKE NINE BLACK   
20110103052320.000|20110103052321.000|CC1|BEETLES INTO THE TEMPLE OF      
20110103052321.000|20110103052322.000|CC1|KARNAK, AND MAYBE THEY SHOULD   
20110103052322.000|20110103052324.000|CC1|RIDE IN EACH MORNING ON         
20110103052324.000|20110103052324.000|CC1|ELEPHANTS.                      
20110103052324.000|20110103052326.000|CC1|>> SETTING A RECORD WITH OVER   
20110103052326.000|20110103052326.000|CC1|75 MILLION POUNDS OF MARBLE USED
20110103052326.000|20110103052327.000|CC1|IN ITS CONSTRUCTION, WHEN IT    
20110103052327.000|20110103052329.000|CC1|OPENED IN 1935, SEVEN OF THE

20110103052330.000|20110103052331.000|CC1|MOVE INTO THEIR CHAMBERS IN THE

20110103052337.000|20110103052339.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE JUSTICES AT THE   
20110103052339.000|20110103052340.000|CC1|TIME DID NOT WANT TO LEAVE      
20110103052340.000|20110103052345.000|CC1|THEIR FORMER CHAMBERS IN THE    
20110103052345.000|20110103052346.000|CC1|BASEMENT OF THE SENATE.         
20110103052346.000|20110103052348.000|CC1|HE SAID, IF WE LEAVE THESE      
20110103052348.000|20110103052350.000|CC1|OFFICES IN THE SENATE, NO ONE   
20110103052350.000|20110103052351.000|CC1|WILL EVER HEAR OF US AGAIN.

20110103052352.000|20110103052354.000|CC1|BRANDEIS SAID HE WOULD NOT COME

20110103052356.000|20110103052357.000|CC1|WOULD NOT, IS THAT HE SAID THE  
20110103052357.000|20110103052401.000|CC1|BUILDING WAS SO LOW AVERAGE, IT 
20110103052401.000|20110103052404.000|CC1|-- SO ELABORATE, IT WOULD GO    
20110103052404.000|20110103052405.000|CC1|THEIR HEADS.                    
20110103052405.000|20110103052406.000|CC1|MAYBE HE WAS RIGHT.             
20110103052406.000|20110103052408.000|CC1|IF YOU COME OVER TIME, IT       
20110103052408.000|20110103052409.000|CC1|BECOMES A SYMBOL OF THE THIRD   
20110103052409.000|20110103052411.000|CC1|BRANCH OF GOVERNMENT, AND THE   
20110103052411.000|20110103052412.000|CC1|NEED FOR STABILITY, RULE OF     
20110103052412.000|20110103052413.000|CC1|LAW, WHICH IS WHAT AMERICA      
20110103052413.000|20110103052413.000|CC1|STANDS FOR.                     
20110103052413.000|20110103052415.000|CC1|>> THE INTERESTING THING IS THAT
20110103052415.000|20110103052416.000|CC1|GILBERT AND TAFT NEVER LIVE TO

20110103052426.000|20110103052427.000|CC1|>> YOU NOT ONLY SEE THE VISION

20110103052431.000|20110103052434.000|CC1|CHARLES EVANS HUGHES, WHO       
20110103052434.000|20110103052436.000|CC1|OVERSAW THE COMPLETION.         
20110103052436.000|20110103052438.000|CC1|AND WHILE MOST SEE THE WEST     
20110103052438.000|20110103052441.000|CC1|PLAZA, ON ITS EAST SIDE IS A    
20110103052441.000|20110103052447.000|CC1|LESS OFTEN USE PART OF THE --   
20110103052447.000|20110103052455.000|CC1|LESS OFTEN PART OF THE --       
20110103052455.000|20110103052458.000|CC1|VIEWED PART OF THE BUILDING, AND
20110103052458.000|20110103052500.000|CC1|ITS PEDIMENTS ABOVE.            
20110103052500.000|20110103052502.000|CC1|>> THE EAST PORTER CO AND PLAZA 
20110103052502.000|20110103052503.000|CC1|OF THE BUILDING IS SURROUNDED   
20110103052503.000|20110103052505.000|CC1|AT THE TOP BY THE EAST PEDIMENT 
20110103052505.000|20110103052506.000|CC1|SCULPTED BY HERBERT MACNEIL.    
20110103052506.000|20110103052509.000|CC1|HE WAS GIVEN A LOT OF RAIN TO   
20110103052509.000|20110103052514.000|CC1|DESIGN HIS OWN IDEAS FOR THE    
20110103052514.000|20110103052518.000|CC1|SCULPTURE, AND HE SHOWS ON THE  
20110103052518.000|20110103052520.000|CC1|-- HE CHOSE FOR THE EASTERN SIDE
20110103052520.000|20110103052521.000|CC1|EASTERN SIDE TO LOOK TOWARD THE 
20110103052521.000|20110103052522.000|CC1|EASTERN TRADITIONS OF LAW FOR   
20110103052522.000|20110103052523.000|CC1|HIS FIGURES.                    
20110103052523.000|20110103052524.000|CC1|THE CENTRAL FIGURE IS MOSES, AND
20110103052524.000|20110103052525.000|CC1|THEN ON EITHER SIDE ARE         
20110103052525.000|20110103052526.000|CC1|CONFUCIUS AND SOLON, THE GREEK  
20110103052526.000|20110103052526.000|CC1|LAWGIVER.                       
20110103052526.000|20110103052528.000|CC1|ON EITHER SIDE ARE ALLEGORICAL  
20110103052528.000|20110103052528.000|CC1|FIGURES, VARIOUS ASPECTS OF THE 
20110103052528.000|20110103052531.000|CC1|LOT AND AUTHORITY.              
20110103052531.000|20110103052539.000|CC1|-- THE LAW AND AUTHORITY.       
20110103052539.000|20110103052540.000|CC1|BUT CORNICE ON EITHER END, THE  
20110103052540.000|20110103052541.000|CC1|ALLEGORY OF THE TORTOISE AND    
20110103052541.000|20110103052543.000|CC1|THE HAIR, THE IDEA THAT THE     
20110103052543.000|20110103052544.000|CC1|SLOW PACE OF JUSTICE OR TORTOISE
20110103052544.000|20110103052545.000|CC1|CARRIES THROUGH IN THE WORK OF  
20110103052545.000|20110103052546.000|CC1|THE COURT AND WILL WIN THE DAY  
20110103052546.000|20110103052547.000|CC1|OF THE FAST PACE OF THE HARE.   
20110103052547.000|20110103052551.000|CC1|ABOVE THE PET -- BELOW THE      
20110103052551.000|20110103052555.000|CC1|PEDIMENT IS THE STATEMENT, ED   
20110103052555.000|20110103052556.000|CC1|JUSTICE, THE GARDENING AND OF   
20110103052556.000|20110103052559.000|CC1|LIBERTY.                        
20110103052559.000|20110103052601.000|CC1|-- JUSTICE, THE GUARDIAN OF     
20110103052601.000|20110103052602.000|CC1|LIBERTY.                        
20110103052602.000|20110103052604.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT CHARLES EVANS      
20110103052604.000|20110103052604.000|CC1|HUGHES WROTE.                   
20110103052604.000|20110103052605.000|CC1|I RATHER PREFER JUST AS THE     
20110103052605.000|20110103052606.000|CC1|GARDEN OF LIBERTY RATHER THAN   
20110103052606.000|20110103052607.000|CC1|THE ONE OF THE ARCHITECTS' FIRM 
20110103052607.000|20110103052610.000|CC1|HAD SUGGESTED.                  
20110103052610.000|20110103052611.000|CC1|?                               
20110103052611.000|20110103052613.000|CC1|>> ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE  
20110103052613.000|20110103052614.000|CC1|SUPREME COURT IS THE WEST       
20110103052614.000|20110103052617.000|CC1|PLAZA, THE TRADITIONAL PUBLIC   
20110103052617.000|20110103052621.000|CC1|INTEREST -- ENTRANCE TO THE     
20110103052621.000|20110103052623.000|CC1|BUILDING, AND ALSO A PLACE WHERE
20110103052623.000|20110103052624.000|CC1|MANY EXPRESS THEIR FEELINGS     
20110103052624.000|20110103052624.000|CC1|ABOUT THE COURT AND THE         
20110103052624.000|20110103052628.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION.                   
20110103052628.000|20110103052629.000|CC1|>>WHAT WE WANT?                 
20110103052629.000|20110103052631.000|CC1|>> I AM NOT SURE THAT GILBERT   
20110103052631.000|20110103052632.000|CC1|INTENDED TO BE A CONVENIENT     
20110103052632.000|20110103052633.000|CC1|SITE FOR PROTEST.               
20110103052633.000|20110103052635.000|CC1|AND TAFT, HEAVILY INVOLVED IN   
20110103052635.000|20110103052636.000|CC1|THE DESIGN, DID NOT INTENDED    
20110103052636.000|20110103052638.000|CC1|FOR THAT PURPOSE.               
20110103052638.000|20110103052641.000|CC1|I UNDERSTAND PEOPLE HAVING      
20110103052641.000|20110103052646.000|CC1|STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT SOME OF   
20110103052646.000|20110103052647.000|CC1|THE THINGS THAT WE DO AND WE    
20110103052647.000|20110103052649.000|CC1|ARE INVOLVED IN, BUT IT IS NOT A
20110103052649.000|20110103052650.000|CC1|SUCH A WISH AND WHERE OUR       
20110103052650.000|20110103052652.000|CC1|DECISION SHOULD BE GUIDED BY    
20110103052652.000|20110103052658.000|CC1|POPULAR PRESSURE.               
20110103052658.000|20110103052659.000|CC1|THE PROTESTS TO SOME EXTENT ARE 
20110103052659.000|20110103052700.000|CC1|THERE IS A WAY FOR PEOPLE TO    
20110103052700.000|20110103052701.000|CC1|EXPRESS THEIR FEELINGS BUT NOT  
20110103052701.000|20110103052702.000|CC1|DIRECTED AND SHOULD NOT BE      
20110103052702.000|20110103052702.000|CC1|DIRECTED AT US.                 
20110103052702.000|20110103052704.000|CC1|YOU WOULD NOT WANT US DECIDING  
20110103052704.000|20110103052704.000|CC1|WHAT THE CONSTITUTION MEAN      
20110103052704.000|20110103052705.000|CC1|BASED ON WHAT THE POPULAR       
20110103052705.000|20110103052706.000|CC1|FEELING IS.                     
20110103052706.000|20110103052708.000|CC1|QUITE OFTEN IN MANY OF OUR MOST 
20110103052708.000|20110103052710.000|CC1|FAMOUS DECISIONS, ONES THAT THE 
20110103052710.000|20110103052712.000|CC1|COURT TOOK THAT WERE QUITE      
20110103052712.000|20110103052714.000|CC1|UNPOPULAR, AND THE IDEA THAT WE 
20110103052714.000|20110103052718.000|CC1|SHOULD FEEL TO WHAT THE PUBLIC  
20110103052718.000|20110103052720.000|CC1|-- WE SHOULD YIELD TO WHAT THE  
20110103052720.000|20110103052721.000|CC1|PUBLIC PROTEST THIS IS QUITE
